chinese: 一个特别值得注意的现象
一个特别值得注意的现象从图表中明显可见
english: A particularly striking phenomenon is evident from the chart
the one data set with the most significant change
has risen/fallen from XXX to XXX

chinese: 变化最显著的数据集从XXX上升/下降到XXX
english: The one data set with the most significant change has risen/fallen from XXX to XXX

chinese: 表现出较不明显的变化
另一个数据集在同一时期表现出较不明显的变化，从XXX增加/减少到XXX
english: Another data set exhibits a less pronounced variation, increasing/decreasing from XXX to XXX over the same period

chinese: 从图表中可以明显看出一个特别值得注意的现象。变化最大的一项数据从XXX上升/下降到XXX。另一组数据的变化幅度不那么明显，其在同一时期从XXX增加/减少到XXX。
english: A particularly striking phenomenon is evident from the chart. The one data set with the most significant change has risen/fallen from XXX to XXX. Another data set exhibits a less pronounced variation, increasing/decreasing from XXX to XXX over the same period.
